info.description: Logs all communication happening with customers (emails, phone calls, meetings, etc)
info.title: Communication Service API

post.description: Create the Email Communication specified within the body of this request.  The created Email Communication will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newEmailCommunicationV1
parameters.description: A new Email Communication to be created

get.description: Retrieves the Email Communication specified by the id provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Communication to get

get.summary: Retrieve lots of Email Communication by id
get.description: Retrieves the page of Email Communication specified by ids provided

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: List of ids

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

get.summary: Find Communication by search string and filter by types

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: List of types separated by comma

parameters.name: sortField
parameters.description: How to sort results. Must be one of the allowable values.

parameters.name: isDescending
parameters.description: Whether to sort by ascending or descending

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Value to search by communication Description, From and To fields

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

updatedOn.description: When the Communication was last modified

notificationEventId.description: Unique id of the NotificationEvent connected with this Communication

type.description: Communication type, can be one of: EMAIL, TEXT, PHONE_CALL, MEETING

updatedOn.description: When the Communication was last modified

contentType.description: Email content type. Can be either TEXT or HTML.

notificationEventId.description: Unique id of the NotificationEvent connected with this Communication

status.description: Status of Email, can be one of: NOT_SENT, UNREAD, READ

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

updatedOn.description: When the Communication was last modified

conversationDate.description: Date and time when the conversation was held

notificationEventId.description: Unique id of the NotificationEvent connected with this Communication

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

relatedObjects.description: A map of different kinds of objects related to the response. Each key in the map is a type of object that is referenced from the content of the response, e.g. a User or an Entity. Each value of the map is itself a map, but of the objects' IDs to the objects themselves so as to allow looking each object up via the ID that was provided in the content.
